Advanced data
Item ID1660

A ruby necklace is made by using a gold bar, a ruby and a necklace mould on a furnace. It requires a Crafting level of 40 and gives 75 experience when made.

The ruby necklace may be enchanted into a Digsite pendant after learning the enchantment spell from one of the archaeologists in the find-cleaning area of the Varrock Museum. The spell is learned by participating in cleaning samples until a Clean necklace is extracted from a sample. When brought to an expert, they will teach the player how to enchant ruby necklaces. After this, the player can enchant them with the Lvl-3 Enchant which requires level 49 Magic.

After the completion of Bone Voyage, players can use this pendant on the southern machine in the House on the Hill, which allows direct teleportation to the House.

This item can be sold to Grum's Gold Exchange in Port Sarim, with a starting price of 1522 coins if none are in stock.
